subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Big Brown (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: Twice Edgar Prado has been the winning rider aboard horses that have thwarted Triple Crown bids, and now he will get a chance to beat a horse he thought he would be riding.
snippet: Twice Edgar Prado has been the winning rider aboard horses that have thwarted Triple Crown bids, and now he will get a chance to beat a horse he thought he would be riding.
